prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Galley Proofs of "Two Weeks in Another Town", 1960, Accession #10934 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given as a gift to the Library on April 4, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of galley proofs, ca. 1960, of Two Weeks in Another Townby Irwin Shaw, published by Random House, 144 pages.
